service.name: Consultations — General

seo.title: Aesthetic Consultations in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Personalized roadmap to your best skin. We assess goals, budget, and timeline to map a smart, stepwise plan.

overview.p1: Not sure where to start? A consult clarifies goals, timelines, and budget so you know exactly what to do—and when.
overview.p2: We’ll map options, prioritize wins, and build a plan that fits life, not just a treatment menu.

whyReluxe.title: Plan you can follow
whyReluxe.body: Clear sequence and cost so you can decide confidently.

whyReluxe.title: Photo-based tracking
whyReluxe.body: We measure progress so you see what’s working.

service.tagline: Personalized roadmap to your best skin.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

flexEverything.intro: We’ll cover your goals, timeline, and budget—and map the smartest path.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
